mil5.3.3:3.1_0: Puna ca tathāgato catunnaṁ parisānaṁ majjhe nisīditvā purato devamanussānaṁ selassa brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassesi.
mil5.3.3:3.3_1: tena hi selassa brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassesīti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.3.3:3.4_0: Yadi selassa brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassesi,
mil5.3.3:3.4_1: tena hi ‘kāyena saṁvaro sādhū’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.3:3.5_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.3:4.1_2: selassa ca brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassitaṁ.
mil5.3.3:4.2_2: tassa bodhanatthāya bhagavā iddhiyā tappaṭibhāgaṁ kāyaṁ dasseti,
mil5.3.3:5.1_3: yaṁ parisagato ekoyeva taṁ guyhaṁ passati,
mil5.3.3:5.2_0: Iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ upadisa, kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehī”ti.
mil5.3.3:5.3_0: “Diṭṭhapubbo pana tayā, mahārāja, koci byādhito puriso parikiṇṇo ñātimittehī”ti.
mil5.3.3:5.5_0: “Api nu kho sā, mahārāja, parisā passatetaṁ vedanaṁ, yāya so puriso vedanāya vedayatī”ti.
mil5.3.3:5.6_0: “Na hi, bhante, attanā yeva so, bhante, puriso vedayatī”ti.
mil5.3.3:5.7_2: tasseva tathāgato bodhanatthāya iddhiyā tappaṭibhāgaṁ kāyaṁ dasseti,
mil5.3.3:6.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, soyeva āturo tassa bhūtassa āgamanaṁ passatī”ti.
mil5.3.3:6.3_2: tasseva tathāgato bodhanatthāya iddhiyā tappaṭibhāgaṁ kāyaṁ dasseti,
mil5.3.3:7.1_0: “Dukkaraṁ, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā kataṁ, yaṁ ekassapi adassanīyaṁ, taṁ dassentenā”ti.
mil5.3.3:7.2_0: “Na, mahārāja, bhagavā guyhaṁ dassesi, iddhiyā pana chāyaṁ dassesī”ti.
mil5.3.3:7.3_0: “Chāyāyapi, bhante, diṭṭhāya diṭṭhaṁyeva hoti guyhaṁ, yaṁ disvā niṭṭhaṁ gato”ti.
mil5.3.3:7.4_0: “Dukkarañcāpi, mahārāja, tathāgato karoti bodhaneyye satte bodhetuṁ.
mil5.3.3:7.5_0: Yadi, mahārāja, tathāgato kiriyaṁ hāpeyya, bodhaneyyā sattā na bujjheyyuṁ.
mil5.3.3:7.6_2: tasmā tathāgato yena yena yogena bodhaneyyā bujjhanti,
mil5.3.3:8.1_1: bhisakko sallakatto yena yena bhesajjena āturo arogo hoti,
mil5.3.3:8.2_1: tathāgato yena yena yogena bodhaneyyā sattā bujjhanti,
mil5.3.3:9.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, itthī mūḷhagabbhā bhisakkassa adassanīyaṁ guyhaṁ dasseti;
mil5.3.3:9.2_1: tathāgato bodhaneyye satte bodhetuṁ adassanīyaṁ guyhaṁ iddhiyā chāyaṁ dassesi.
mil5.3.3:9.3_0: Natthi, mahārāja, adassanīyo nāma okāso puggalaṁ upādāya.
mil5.3.3:9.4_2: tassapi bhagavā yogena hadayaṁ dasseyya, yogaññū, mahārāja,
mil5.3.3:10.1_1: tathāgato therassa nandassa adhimuttiṁ jānitvā taṁ devabhavanaṁ netvā devakaññāyo dassesi ‘imināyaṁ kulaputto bujjhissatī’ti,
mil5.3.3:10.2_1: tathāgato anekapariyāyena subhanimittaṁ hīḷento garahanto jigucchanto tassa bodhanahetu kakuṭapādiniyo accharāyo dassesi.
mil5.3.3:11.1_1: tathāgato therassa cūḷapanthakassa bhātarā nikkaḍḍhitassa dukkhitassa dummanassa upagantvā sukhumaṁ coḷakhaṇḍaṁ
mil5.3.3:11.1_3: so ca kulaputto tena kāraṇena jinasāsane vasībhāvaṁ pāpuṇi.
mil5.3.3:12.1_1: tathāgato brāhmaṇassa mogharājassa yāva tatiyaṁ pañhaṁ puṭṭho na byākāsi ‘evamimassa kulaputtassa māno upasamissati,
mil5.3.3:12.1_3: tena ca tassa kulaputtassa māno upasami,
mil5.3.3:12.1_4: mānūpasamā so brāhmaṇo chasu abhiññāsu vasībhāvaṁ pāpuṇi.
